001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
005
006/**
007 * A marker interface used to identify an {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} as the head
008 * of a cycle of item that loop back to the head.
009 * <p>
010 * This is needed to prevent infinite recursion when searching
011 * {@link IModuleNodeItem} graphs.
012 */
013public interface ICycledAssemblyNodeItem extends IAssemblyNodeItem {
014  /**
015   * Get the assembly item at the head of the cycle.
016   *
017   * @return the assembly item at the head of the cycle
018   */
019  @NonNull
020  IAssemblyNodeItem getCycledNodeItem();
021}
